name: Leogan
description:
Community Game Jam 2019

This Game is a Liar, trust the clues at your own risk. 

There are 60 words with their own clues included however the Random function I have called doesn't seem that random, ahh well.

This is my first ever Game, first time scripting in C# and first time using Unity.

I could have done a better job on all aspects, but I've gotten my first release out of the way, it was never going to be perfect.
